name: Boat Exploration [Adventure Game] OPEN-ALPHA
description:
Boat Exploration is simple Adventure Game made in Unity 5! This game has simple storyline, missions and more will be added soon! This is OPEN-ALPHA version - everything can be changed! Game has 4 levels of difficulty and 4 playable game levels (more will come soon)!

What is new in Update 2?

new Main Menu, new Timer, new radar, new system!

What will come soon?

new game mode, new levels, leaderboard and stats!
